text: oh inu okhulupirira! Khalani otumikira Mulungu monga momwe ananenera Yesu, mwana wa mwamuna wa Maria, kwa ophunzira ake: “Kodi ndani andithandiza ine potumikira Mulungu?” Iwo adayankha: “Ife ndife othandiza Mulungu.” Kotero ena mwa ana a Israyeli adakhulupirira pamene ena sadakhulupirire. Motero Ife tidawapatsa mphamvu iwo amene adakhulupirira zopambana adani awo ndipo iwo adapambanadi
